Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik Walkthrough

Sneak into the House of Hope, and get the Gauntlets of Hill Giant Strength in the Archive. Once you grab the item, the devils in House of Hope turn hostile. Note: Helsik has a special aura called Infectious Greed (The affected entity's attacks deal an additional 6d6 Piercing damage in the presence of Helsik.
